name: Austin Peters
content: Working with Johnny was so easy. He understood our project quickly and was even sending drafts and tests before we'd begun, which made the choice to work with him very clear. He works fast and efficiently, has a good sense of design, and listened to all of our minor requests as we neared completion. All in all, he's a great person to hire for web dev or design work.

name: Maybe You?
position: Product Lead at Your Next Launch
content: Needed cleaner flows and less chaos—got polished interfaces, predictable sprints, and a build everyone feels confident shipping.

name: Satisfied Customer!
position: Founder at The Next Big Thing
content: Clean design, smooth systems, and a rollout that felt effortless. We asked for order and got a workflow we’re proud to show off.
